channel.title: Were do i put the servers i download? need help quick!
channel.description: im new to this... :( i need to know were to put the servers i download that are in .rar format? like [i]Phonescape[/i], or [i]cheezscape[/i]? i downloaded them to my documents and there in .rar format, were do i put them now? :confused:

ty all it really helped!

item.source: Were do i put the servers i download? need help quick!

item.title: Were do i put the servers i download? need help quick!
item.dc:creator: @Minimi_Guard Minimi Guard
item.description:
@Minimi_Guard wrote:

Well, when you download a source, you need to extract it. So heres how you would do it. Download Winrar if you don’t have it. Then once you have your source, it should be in that book icon kinda thing. So make a new folder then double click on your source and once you’re there, extract all the info on that file to that new folder. And that’s it. also when you get that. To play on your server right open your source thats in tha tnew folder and double click on your compiler, erase evertyhing in there and paste this in instead:

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Notice where it s ays yourservernamehere, type in your server name, now right click on your runserver and erase everything in there and paste this in:

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Notice the “yourservernamehere” type in your server name there, has to be the same as the one from the compiler. Now to play your server, you need to double click on your runserver, and then log in. Or if that doesn’t work, lets say your source is like runescape or something then wait till it says “starting runescape blah blah blah…” I didn’t mean blah blah, but i mean and so on…But if that doesn’t work, close your runserver and double click on your compiler, then wait till it says “press any key to continue” do that, then double click on your runserver and log in. Hope that helped

    Proud owner of MinimiScape: MinimiGuard
